amendment.description: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to decrease the appropriation for the National Institutes of Health buildings and facilities by $59,000,000 and increase the appropriation for Project BioShield by $50,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harris amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Harris amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Harris amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
